scripts.build: enoki ../content && browserify index.js -o ../bundles/bundle.js -t sheetify -p [css-extract -o ../bundles/bundle.css] -t yo-yoify -g es2040 -p tinyify
scripts.start: enoki ../content && watchify index.js -o ../bundles/bundle.js -t sheetify -p [css-extract -o ../bundles/bundle.css] -t yo-yoify -t es2040
